normalised: Gas Cylinder Prices Giving Diwali Blues?

unnormalised: Guess what, folks? That celebratory biryani you were planning for Diwali might just cost you a bit more this year. Sources say domestic gas cylinder prices are seeing another nudge upwards.
normalised: Guess what, folks? That celebratory biryani you were planning for Diwali might just cost you a bit more this year. Sources say domestic gas cylinder prices are seeing another nudge upwards.

unnormalised: While official announcements are still awaited, whispers around Indraprastha Gas Limited (IGL) suggest a potential hike of around Rs. 50 per cylinder. Ouch!
normalised: While official announcements are still awaited, whispers around Indraprastha Gas Limited (I G L) suggest a potential hike of around rupees fifty per cylinder. Ouch!

unnormalised: This comes on the heels of previous price adjustments, leaving many families feeling the pinch. Remember Aunty Meena from next door complaining last month? Well, she might be right this time!
normalised: This comes on the heels of previous price adjustments, leaving many families feeling the pinch. Remember Aunty Meena from next door complaining last month? Well, she might be right this time!

unnormalised: Analysts are blaming fluctuating global energy markets and geopolitical tensions for the price volatility. They are telling us to expect "short term pain" (whatever that means).
normalised: Analysts are blaming fluctuating global energy markets and geopolitical tensions for the price volatility. They are telling us to expect "short term pain" (whatever that means).

unnormalised: The government is supposedly considering subsidies, but nothing concrete yet. So, should we stock up now? That's the question everyone in Delhi NCR is asking. Looks like Diwali budgets might need some tweaking. Time to explore alternative cooking methods maybe? Anyone got a good chulha recipe?
normalised: The government is supposedly considering subsidies, but nothing concrete yet. So, should we stock up now? That's the question everyone in Delhi N C R is asking.
